title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Friday, October 13 (game #627)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: World’s biggest PC vendor takes first step that could establish Android as Windows biggest rival ever — and eliminate Google ChromeOS at the same time

title: Microsoft is ending support for Windows 11 update 21H2, here's what you need to do next
description: Microsoft announced that it would be ending support for Windows 11 update 21H2, and that users will need to update to the latest weapon.

title: Starlink's new cellular service lets you stay connected even off the grid

description: Threads' new Edit Threads option is easy to use but not perfect

title: Princess Peach: Showtime's official art has been changed to make Peach look more like her movie counterpart
description: Nintendo has changed the official artwork for Princess Peach: Showtime, making the titular character look a lot more expressive.

title: Kia bets all on electric and unveils EV3 and EV4 concepts

description: Valve has announced that it will be discontinuing Counter-Strike 2 support on older hardware and Mac.

title: Google Chrome will soon stop cookies entirely - but probably not for you
